title: Quality control of cardiac magnetic resonance imaging segmentation, feature tracking, aortic flow and native T1 analysis using automated batch processing in the UK …
details: S Chadalavada, E Rauseo, A Salih, H Naderi, M Khanji… - European Heart Journal …, 2024
abstract: Background Automated algorithms are regularly used to analyse cardiac magnetic resonance (CMR) images. Validating data output reliability from this method is crucial for enabling widespread adoption. We outline a visual quality control (QC) …
